titles: Transubstantiation defended and prov'd from Scripture in answer to the first part of a treatise intitled, A discourse against transubstantiation.
author: Gother, John, d. 1704.
notes: In reply to a pamphlet by John Tillotson, Archbishop of Canterbury.
Attributed to John Gother. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Newberry Library.
